name: Chess at the End of Time
name_original: Chess at the End of Time
description:
Corruption has spread to the Blue, Green and Red nations, whole cities are wiped out in mere days. The kings scramble to organise their armies, with little success.

A chess-like strategy game with unforgiving odds.
Coordinate three armies through levels that decay as you play. 
Use your positioning to delay the corruption.
Protect your king at all costs.

Game made by JUSTCAMH in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50.
Music by ClockMaker (Get the soundtrack)

Hey you, player! I'd love to chat strategy with ya, there's honestly so many possibilities I doubt even I've got the meta figured out. Come join me on discord!
